org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl
Class AeDataConverter

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.AeDataConverter
public class AeDataConverter
extends java.lang.Object

Utility class for converting between wsio data and our standard data container. The wsio packaging provides a standalone set of interfaces and support classes for dispatching messages to the engine and for invoking external web services. In order to simplify the packaging, the wsio project does not have ties to the rest of the activebpel codebase. One side effect is that we're left with two different interfaces
